title: 92-Year-Old UK Man Charged With Woman's 1967 Rape And Murder
content: A 92-year-old man has been charged in the UK with the murder and rape of a woman almost six decades ago, British police said Wednesday.
summary: A 92-year-old man has been charged in the UK with the murder and rape of a woman almost six decades ago, British police said Wednesday.

title: Who Is Dr Oz, Trump's Pick For Medicare? Here's All You Need To Know
content: Oz is another addition to the unconventional health team after Trump tapped Robert F Kennedy Junior as secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services.
summary: Oz is another addition to the unconventional health team after Trump tapped Robert F Kennedy Junior as secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services.

title: Video: Endangered Fin Whale Washes Ashore In Alaska, Draws Massive Crowd
content: The colossal carcass, comparable in length to a college basketball court, drew a huge crowd as hundreds of locals flocked to the shore to catch a glimpse.
summary: The colossal carcass, comparable in length to a college basketball court, drew a huge crowd as hundreds of locals flocked to the shore to catch a glimpse.

title: Opinion: G20 Climate Declaration: It's Only Words...
content: The declaration's call for circular economies and waste reduction is undermined by its refusal to confront the unsustainable consumption patterns of high-income countries.
summary: The declaration's call for circular economies and waste reduction is undermined by its refusal to confront the unsustainable consumption patterns of high-income countries.

title: Earth's 'Second Moon' Set To Disappear, Won't Return Until 2055
content: The space visitor is about 33 feet wide, which might sound scary - but Nasa notes that it "does not pose a hazard to Earth".
summary: The space visitor is about 33 feet wide, which might sound scary - but Nasa notes that it "does not pose a hazard to Earth".

title: Screams, Eerie Laughter: North Korea's New Weapons Against South Korea
content: Gunshots, screams, eerie laughter: South Korea's border island Ganghwa is being bombarded nightly with blood-curdling sounds, part of a new campaign by the nuclear-armed North that is driving residents to despair.
summary: Gunshots, screams, eerie laughter: South Korea's border island Ganghwa is being bombarded nightly with blood-curdling sounds, part of a new campaign by the nuclear-armed North that is driving residents to despair.

title: "They're Trying To Kill Me": Andhra Maid Alleges Torture In Kuwait
content: A woman from Andhra Pradesh, working as a house help in Kuwait has accused her employers of torture. The woman, a native of Kakinada district, recorded a video explaining her ordeal and sent it to her relatives.
summary: A woman from Andhra Pradesh, working as a house help in Kuwait has accused her employers of torture. The woman, a native of Kakinada district, recorded a video explaining her ordeal and sent it to her relatives.

title: Single Cell Could Be Capable Of 'Learning': Study
content: Cells, such as those making up human bodies, might be capable of 'learning', once deemed exclusive to complex creatures with brains, including birds and mammals, a new study has suggested.
summary: Cells, such as those making up human bodies, might be capable of 'learning', once deemed exclusive to complex creatures with brains, including birds and mammals, a new study has suggested.

title: 'I'm A Celebrity' Star Tulisa Reveals She Is Demisexual. What Is It
content: Tulisa said it makes her feel "physically sick" to imagine sleeping with or dating someone she doesn't have a connection with.
summary: Tulisa said it makes her feel "physically sick" to imagine sleeping with or dating someone she doesn't have a connection with.

title: UK's Costly Railway Project Faces Growing Doubts Over Its Purpose
content: When the project involves building through one of Europe's most densely populated countries, like Britain, both costs and opposition skyrocket.
summary: When the project involves building through one of Europe's most densely populated countries, like Britain, both costs and opposition skyrocket.

title: India 'Unsatisfied' With UNSC's Pace Of Progress, Says Stuck In 1945
content: "The Security Council structure, as it stands today, is a reflection of 1945. It does not reflect today's realities," India's Permanent Representative to the UN Ambassador Parvathaneni Harish said during a conversation here on Tuesday.
summary: "The Security Council structure, as it stands today, is a reflection of 1945. It does not reflect today's realities," India's Permanent Representative to the UN Ambassador Parvathaneni Harish said during a conversation here on Tuesday.

title: Happy Birthday, Goku And Friends: Japan's 'Dragon Ball' Turns 40
content: "Dragon Ball" fans on Wednesday celebrated 40 years of the globally beloved Japanese manga, anime and video game franchise, just months after creator Akira Toriyama's unexpected death.
summary: "Dragon Ball" fans on Wednesday celebrated 40 years of the globally beloved Japanese manga, anime and video game franchise, just months after creator Akira Toriyama's unexpected death.

title: Man Who Stabbed 3 To Death In New York Says He Killed Them Because...
content: The man who stabbed three people to death in Manhattan has confessed to targeting victims because they were "alone" and "distracted".
summary: The man who stabbed three people to death in Manhattan has confessed to targeting victims because they were "alone" and "distracted".

title: By 2050, Children Could Face 8 Times More Heatwaves Than In 2000: UNICEF
content: Demographic shifts, worsening climate change and rapid technological transformation risk creating a bleak future for youth in the mid-21st century, UNICEF warned.
summary: Demographic shifts, worsening climate change and rapid technological transformation risk creating a bleak future for youth in the mid-21st century, UNICEF warned.

title: UK Met Office Issues Yellow Warning For Snow And Ice, Panic Buying Expected
content: Travel on National Highways is expected to be disrupted as weather office has predicted 10-15cm of snow on some motorways.
summary: Travel on National Highways is expected to be disrupted as weather office has predicted 10-15cm of snow on some motorways.

title: How Biden's "Fade-Out" Into Amazon Rainforest Went Viral
content: Four years ago, President Joe Biden declared "America's back" and told his fellow world leaders that Donald Trump had been an aberration.
summary: Four years ago, President Joe Biden declared "America's back" and told his fellow world leaders that Donald Trump had been an aberration.

title: Dream In Debris: Israeli Strike Pushes Footballer Celine Haidar To Coma
content: Lebanese footballer Celine Haidar was about to make her dream of playing for the national women's team come true, but debris from an Israeli strike left the 19-year-old in a coma.
summary: Lebanese footballer Celine Haidar was about to make her dream of playing for the national women's team come true, but debris from an Israeli strike left the 19-year-old in a coma.

title: 'You Will Die In Lies!': Daughter Clashes With Father At French Rape Trial
content: The daughter of the French man standing trial for enlisting dozens of strangers to rape his heavily-sedated wife clashed with her father at his trial, shouting in the courtroom that he would "die in lies".
summary: The daughter of the French man standing trial for enlisting dozens of strangers to rape his heavily-sedated wife clashed with her father at his trial, shouting in the courtroom that he would "die in lies".

title: Trump Ally Seeks To Block Trans Lawmaker From Women's Restrooms
content: Democrats and LGBTQ rights advocates expressed outrage after a Republican lawmaker introduced a measure that would ban the first openly transgender person elected to the US Congress from using women's restrooms in the building.
summary: Democrats and LGBTQ rights advocates expressed outrage after a Republican lawmaker introduced a measure that would ban the first openly transgender person elected to the US Congress from using women's restrooms in the building.

title: All About Bryan Johnson, Tech Millionaire Who Is Trying To 'Reverse' Ageing
content: Millionaire tech entrepreneur Bryan Johnson suffered a severe allergic reaction and temporary disfigurement after his recent anti-ageing procedure.
summary: Millionaire tech entrepreneur Bryan Johnson suffered a severe allergic reaction and temporary disfigurement after his recent anti-ageing procedure.
